title: Looking for some Resource packs

replies.body:
Tell me what your looking for? Ill make you a format.

HD or no?

Default edit?

Faithful edit?

R3D Craft Efit?

Defscape edit?

Do you want it to be mainly PvP oriented, or more of a easy going, good looking, but still with the pvp features, such as low fire, bow meter and such. Mainly PvP oriented is basically extremely big particles, clear inv, and blah blah blah. You know.

Last of all, tell me what you play most. At the end, ill have an idea of what you want, and ill make a custom pack for you =). Afterwards, ill send you different versions of the pack and have you tell me what you want changed.

replies.body:
Because I really like the default but not
with the same texture some blocks such as wood, stone and so that the fire is
reduced, the water clear and transparent, not very large particles so they do
not bother, but the gui transparent the edges of the slots, I really like
swords 32 pixels but not so large , the arches of 16 pixels and the other like
items of 16 pixels , the sounds that you had in your other you can add the
packs . If you can put to full brightness in the pack I would greatly
appreciate it. The pointer would be fine if it's something small.
Whether it would be a pack of pvp xD I hope and not demanding XD Love you Sevoh ! : 3

replies.body:
Ill do that for you :D

but for the part with full brightness you can just do it with using every pack you have with doing this.

1-go to either the start menu if you have windows 7, or press b and the windows key if you have windows 8.

2-type %appdata%, roaming, .minecraft

3- go to options

4-go to GAMMA and set it at 1000.
replies.body_tagged:
Ill do that for you :D

but for the part with full brightness you can just do it with using every pack you have with doing this.

1-go to either the start menu if you have windows 7, or press b and the windows key if you have windows 8.

2-type %appdata%, roaming, .minecraft

3- go to options

4-go to GAMMA and set it at 1000.

replies.body:
Ive used a lot of packs and there are a lot of good in some of them. Heres a few point outs. Btw these are all pvp based.

Best Overall = Eum's
Best Lagfree = Paper cutouts
Best for Avi/Ocn = plastpack.
Best for survival/vanilla = ngal uhc pack
Best bow = Scop3's pack
Best sword (Dia) = iCookie
Best rod = Huahwi pack
Best for pot = IDK I like to mix it up.
I'll add some honorable mentions later.
